statements: DELETE FROM GMOCropYields WHERE growing_season = 2022 AND GMO_affected = FALSE;
DELETE FROM GMOCropYields WHERE GMO_affected = FALSE AND growing_season = 2022;
DELETE FROM GMOCropYields WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND yield_in_tons > 5.0;
DELETE FROM gmos WHERE trait = 'Drought-resistant' AND gmo_id = 3;
DELETE FROM gmo_impact WHERE impact_id = 5 AND impact_rating > 3;
DELETE FROM gmo_effects WHERE crop_id = 5 AND season_id = 3;
DELETE FROM crops WHERE yield_in_tons > 50 AND crop_name = 'Corn';
